thread.title: Oprah's magazine touts R.I. Jack-O-Lantern Spectacular
thread.title_full: Oprah's magazine touts R.I. Jack-O-Lantern Spectacular

author: Alan Rosenberg
title: Oprah's magazine touts R.I. Jack-O-Lantern Spectacular
text: Oprah's magazine touts R.I. Jack-O-Lantern Spectacular "Forget two triangles and a crooked smile," the story begins. Comment Follow @alanrosenbergpj Posted Oct. 5, 2015 @ 10:45 am PROVIDENCE, R.I. -- Roger Williams Park Zoo's Jack-O-Lantern Spectacular gets a shout-out from Oprah Winfrey's magazine in a story about pumpkin carving . "Forget two triangles and a crooked smile," the story begins. "The most memorable of the 5,000-plus illuminated pumpkins at Rhode Island's Roger Williams Park Zoo Jack-O-Lantern Spectacular feature ethereal hand-carved portraits (the Beatles ... Marilyn Monroe ... Elvis) and scenes from movie classics (like The Wizard of Oz and The Sound of Music)." The story, in O: The Oprah Magazine's October edition, goes on to give pumpkin-carving tips from John Reckner, the man behind the annual displays.
